archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Business continity strategy alignment process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
This process ensures that Business Continuity strategy is based on sound undertanding of organization taking into account risk appetite, changes of threat landscape, stakeholder requirements, prtecting the confidentiality, integrity and availability of the information, business environments including the laws and legistlations and arrangements with external parties (eg. our customers, or our suppliers)
As sub-part of this process, there is Business Continuity Enterprise Resilience Planning Process which takes care of BC1.2.6:
The business continuity management team should consider: a) current and achievable levels of operational and IT resilience b) scenarios where multiple business environments are compromised simultaneously, including operational and IT infrastructure, services and environments (e.g. by a ransomware or nation state attack) c) actions to take in unusual circumstances (e.g. if backups are not available, if all systems and services need to be restored or all technology has been compromised).
